title: Innocent Encounter
description: Lady Arabella has not always been the most gracious of young ladies, so when her Father loses his fortune gambling and tries to make reparations by forcing her to marry a man nearly twice her age, some might call it a well deserved comeuppance... If only they knew, but Arabella refuses let it come to that, and sets out to publicly ruin herself at the hand of a Lord of her choosing.
author: Megan Berry
